snippet: Observers say Janet L. Yellen, the new chairwoman of the Federal Reserve, is taking over as the relatively clear decisions of the financial crisis must give way to more complex ones.
abstract: Observers say Janet L Yellen, new chairwoman of Federal Reserve, is taking over during challenging time when agency must begin making complex decisions to calibrate monetary policy as the economy recovers; immediate challenge facing Yellen is to overhaul Fed's forward guidance for short-term interest rates.
lead_paragraph: Observers say Janet L. Yellen, the new chairwoman of the Federal Reserve, is taking over as the relatively clear decisions of the financial crisis must give way to more complex ones.

headline.main: Murky Path for the Fed as Yellen Takes Reins
headline.print_headline: Murky Path for the Fed as Yellen Takes Reins
